message.content:

Now let me sum all these expenses:

Total Administrative Expenses = 17956.71
Total Sales Expenses = 7366.01
Total Financial Expenses = 4319.52

Total Expenses = 17956.71 + 7366.01 + 4319.52 + 91509.94 = 121152.18
